Container.Name: TAK-Server-InstallTAK
Container.Overview:
TAK Server 5.4 using InstallTAK Script for Unraid
**BULLETPROOF INSTALLATION:** 1. Download TAK Server 5.4 DEB from https://tak.gov/products/tak-server 2. Download required files: takserver_*_all.deb, takserver-public-gpg.key, deb_policy.pol 3. Place all files in /mnt/user/appdata/tak-server 4. Start container - Fixed script handles ALL known issues automatically 5. Access TAK Server at https://YOUR-IP:8960
**REQUIRED FILES:** ✓ takserver_5.4-RELEASE-XX_all.deb (main package) ✓ takserver-public-gpg.key (GPG verification key) ✓ deb_policy.pol (policy file)
**FEATURES:** ✓ Uses proven InstallTAK script with comprehensive fixes ✓ Automatic Java 17 JDK installation ✓ PostgreSQL 15 setup with proper PGDATA configuration ✓ Pre-creates all required users and directories ✓ Professional certificate generation ✓ Built-in database schema setup ✓ Native Ubuntu DEB installation
**FIXES APPLIED:** ✓ Java dependency issues resolved upfront ✓ PostgreSQL version mismatch fixed ✓ Missing config files created automatically ✓ PGDATA environment properly configured ✓ All known InstallTAK issues addressed ✓ Robust error handling and recovery
Container.PostArgs: bash -c "apt-get update && apt-get install -y git wget curl && git clone https://github.com/Zeroradiance/tak-server-unraid.git /tmp/setup && chmod +x /tmp/setup/scripts/setup-installtak-fixed.sh && exec /tmp/setup/scripts/setup-installtak-fixed.sh"
Container.Description: TAK Server 5.4 using bulletproof InstallTAK script with all known issues fixed
